Package org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClusterFactory  
    Device  
    DeviceDescription
    This class represent static description associated to a generic Home Automation Device
    as defined by the document:
    ZigBee Home Automation public release version 075123r01ZB
    In particular, this class can be used for inspecting by code the ZigBee Home Automation
    definition.
    DeviceFactory
    This class represent the main interface for the extendable architecture of the
    refinement driver.
    DeviceListener
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDeviceDescription  
    ClusterFactoryBase  
    ClusterFactoryImpl  
    DeviceBase
    This class represent a generic Home Automation Device as defined by the document:
    ZigBee Home Automation public release version 075123r01ZB
    NOTE: In general the mapping between ClusterId and Cluster is defined
    by the profile, while the mapping between Name and Cluster is defined where the
    Cluster is defined: usually inside a Cluster Library
    DeviceFactoryBase  
    DeviceFactoryImpl
    Generic class that simplify the creation of factory, and avoids the creation of a class for
    each factory that we want to register
    ReportingConfiguration
    The interface of the service registered by the Home Automation Driver architecture
    which is used to provides among all the bundles composing the Home Automation Driver,
    (i.e.: core drivers and driver extension) the default configuration of the reporting

    Interfaces that contains the definition of all the properties key and default values,
    that affects the reporting behavior of the Home Automation Driver architecture
    ZigBeeApiConstants  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ZigBeeDeviceException
